item.title: Rategain Travel Technologies Ltd Hits Intraday High with 7.87% Surge
item.description: Rategain Travel Technologies Ltd demonstrated a robust intraday performance on 17 Feb 2026, surging to an intraday high of Rs 582.5, marking a significant 7.97% increase. This surge outpaced the broader IT - Software sector and the Sensex, reflecting a notable rebound after a five-day decline. Time: 6 minutes ago

item.title: Chennai Ferrous Industries Ltd Falls to 52-Week Low Amidst Continued Underperformance
item.description: Chennai Ferrous Industries Ltd has reached a new 52-week low, reflecting ongoing challenges in its financial performance and market positioning. item.title: Shrenik Ltd Surges to Upper Circuit Amid Strong Buying Pressure
item.description: Shrenik Ltd, a micro-cap player in the miscellaneous sector, witnessed a robust rally on 17 Feb 2026, hitting its upper circuit limit with a 2.27% gain. The stock’s surge was driven by intense buying interest, resulting in a freeze on further trading and highlighting unfulfilled demand among investors. Time: 22 minutes ago

item.title: Manaksia Aluminium Company Ltd Surges to Upper Circuit Amid Strong Buying Pressure
item.description: Manaksia Aluminium Company Ltd (Stock ID: 740084) surged to its upper circuit limit on 17 Feb 2026, closing at ₹29.98, marking a maximum daily gain of 4.97%. item.title: One 97 Communications Ltd Sees Robust Value Trading Amid Sector Outperformance
item.description: One 97 Communications Ltd, the parent company of Paytm, emerged as one of the most actively traded stocks by value on 17 Feb 2026, reflecting renewed investor interest and a notable reversal in its recent downtrend. The stock outperformed its sector and broader market indices, buoyed by strong institutional participation and significant order flow, signalling potential shifts in market sentiment towards this fintech heavyweight. Time: 22 minutes ago

item.title: Sikko Industries Ltd Hits Lower Circuit Amid Heavy Selling Pressure
item.description: Sikko Industries Ltd, a micro-cap player in the fertilisers sector, witnessed a sharp decline on 17 Feb 2026, hitting its lower circuit limit of ₹5.07, marking a maximum daily loss of 4.88%. The stock underperformed its sector and the broader market amid intense selling pressure and panic-driven trading activity. Time: 22 minutes ago

item.title: Jaiprakash Associates Ltd Surges to Upper Circuit on Robust Buying Pressure
item.description: Shares of Jaiprakash Associates Ltd surged to hit the upper circuit limit on 17 Feb 2026, registering a maximum daily gain of 4.97% to close at ₹3.38. This sharp rally was driven by robust buying interest, despite the company’s ongoing challenges and a recent downgrade to a Strong Sell rating by MarketsMOJO. The stock outperformed its sector and the broader market, signalling renewed investor attention in the micro-cap construction firm. Time: 22 minutes ago

item.title: KFin Technologies Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amid Rising Market Activity
item.description: KFin Technologies Ltd (KFINTECH) has witnessed a significant surge in open interest (OI) in its derivatives segment, signalling heightened market participation and evolving investor positioning. The stock’s recent outperformance relative to its sector and a notable increase in delivery volumes underscore a developing narrative of renewed investor interest and potential directional bets. Time: 22 minutes ago

item.title: Premier Ltd Shares Plunge to Lower Circuit Amid Heavy Selling Pressure
item.description: Shares of Premier Ltd, a micro-cap player in the industrial manufacturing sector, plunged to their lower circuit limit on 17 Feb 2026, reflecting intense selling pressure and panic among investors. The stock closed at ₹3.04, down 1.3% on the day, marking its maximum permissible daily loss and signalling unfilled supply overwhelming demand. Time: 22 minutes ago

item.title: Newgen Software Technologies Ltd Sees Surge in Value Trading Amid Sector Outperformance
item.description: Newgen Software Technologies Ltd witnessed a remarkable spike in trading activity on 17 Feb 2026, emerging as one of the most actively traded stocks by value in the Computers - Software & Consulting sector. item.title: Quarterly Earnings Review: Dec-2025 Results Show Mixed Trends Across Market Caps
item.description: The December 2025 quarter earnings season has revealed a nuanced picture of corporate performance across Indian markets, with 4,073 companies reporting results. While the overall proportion of positive earnings has inched up to 46.0%, the distribution across market capitalisation segments and sectors highlights varied momentum and emerging trends. Time: 22 minutes ago

item.title: Norben Tea & Exports Ltd Surges to Upper Circuit on Robust Buying Momentum
item.description: Norben Tea & Exports Ltd (NSE: BE) surged to its upper circuit limit on 17 Feb 2026, closing at ₹84.80, marking a maximum daily gain of 4.99%. The stock’s sharp rally was driven by strong buying interest, with volumes and delivery percentages signalling heightened investor participation despite a micro-cap market cap of ₹130 crores. This performance notably outpaced the FMCG sector and broader market indices, underscoring renewed optimism in the company’s near-term prospects. Time: 22 minutes ago

item.title: Davangere Sugar Company Ltd Sees Exceptional Volume Surge Amid Mixed Technical Signals

item.title: Eastern Silk Industries Ltd Plunges to Lower Circuit Amid Heavy Selling Pressure
item.description: Eastern Silk Industries Ltd witnessed a sharp decline on 17 Feb 2026, hitting its lower circuit limit of 5% and closing at ₹57.46. The stock faced intense selling pressure, marking its fourth consecutive day of losses and continuing a prolonged downtrend that has wiped out nearly 18% of its value in just four sessions. Time: 22 minutes ago

item.title: Union Bank of India Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Signalling Strong Market Positioning
item.description: Union Bank of India has witnessed a significant surge in open interest (OI) in its derivatives segment, reflecting a notable shift in market sentiment and positioning. The bank’s stock has recently hit a new 52-week high of Rs 189.6, supported by robust volume and positive price momentum, suggesting that investors are increasingly optimistic about its near-term prospects.
